titleStmt.title: The divine portrait. Or, A true and liuely representation of the blessed sacrament of the Lords Supper: with our due preparation how to receive the same worthily. / Delivered in a sermon, at the Reformed Church of Paris (on Easter day last:) by Monsieur Iohn Mestrezat ... ; Englished by John Reynolds.
titleStmt.author: Mestrezat, Jean, 1592-1657.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.M. for G. Baker, and are to sold at his shop neere Charing-crosse.,

notesStmt.note: Errors in paging: p. 5-6 repeated in numbering; last p. numbered 147 [should be 174].
Reproduction of original in: Dr. Williams's Library.
